OOC:( the history is of little consiquence right now.  If the sight 
of a bot is black and white, it puts the bot at a disadvantage.  Much 
like dear and wolves and other animals that see black and white, 
since they cannot see color, they can be fooled visually. Now if he 
was to use a heat scanner to use to see, then that would put a whole 
new light on things.)
